mi:PackageInformation.name: Orckestra.Search.MediaContentIndexing
mi:PackageInformation.author: Orckestra A/S
mi:PackageInformation.TechnicalDetails: Indexing PDF files may require PDF IFilter being installed on the server machine. Rember to rebuild the search index after the installation.
mi:PackageInformation.Description: Enables indexing media archive text content, such as PDF and DOCX.
